title: Kyuujitsu to Satou
description:
Natsu may seem as an ordinary man at first sight but actually he is the lover of a popular businessman, Wallace Garland. Being apart from him for two months, Natsu just can't wait for their lustful bedroom action.

(From: Heterophobia Fansub)
